name: Denying Death
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50. Happy 20th Anniversary

Rock legend Rocky Young is approaching his 113th birthday. But Death himself has decided that it is time for Rocky to die and has launched a full on attack on his mansion. Can you defeat Death's horde of goons and delay the inevitable death?

Instructions

A / D - Move left and right

Space / W - Jump

E - lay out traps

Q - Board up windows

Point and click - Shoot
